text: Samuel Parker (1872 – unknown) was a Scottish footballer. His regular position was as a forward. He was born in Hurlford. He played for Hurlford, Burnley, and Manchester United. ==External links== *MUFCInfo.com profile Category:1872 births Category:Scottish footballers Category:Burnley F.C. players Category:Manchester United F.C. players Category:Year of death missing Category:Date of birth missing Category:Hurlford United F.C. players Category:People from Ayrshire Category:Association football forwards
title: Samuel Parker (footballer)
